casebody.data:
GREEN, MOORE & COMPANY et al., Plaintiffs in Error, v. UNITED STATES of America, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 23, 1928. No. 5225. Charles A. McCoy, of Lake Charles, La., for plaintiffs in error. Philip H. Meeom, U. S. Atty., and J. Pair Hardin, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Shreveport, La., for the United States.

Before WALKER, BRYAN, and POSTER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The appeal in this case is dismissed.
